avatarNotAllowed: This avatar is paid or not allowed, please choose another.
sureLeaveMeeting: Are you sure you want to leave the meeting?
errorTaskAvatarPlease: Error with avatar interaction, please try again a bit later
sessionCreationCompleted: Click the icon to interact. You can chat with the avatar from icon and change the voice or language from icon

cannotVoice: Most probably I cannot reply you with voice in the language you requested. You can change the voice of the avatar from the dropdown located at top right of the screen.
profanityWarning: Inappropriate language is not allowed, bye.
